Make a cardboard box with a miniature garden inside, complete with miniature plants, a miniature fence, and a miniature bench for visitors to sit on.
Build a cardboard box fort for your child to play in, complete with a cardboard cannon, a cardboard sword, and a cardboard flag.
Create a cardboard box with a miniature city inside, complete with miniature buildings, miniature cars, and miniature people.
